column4: hi all. i have a problem upgrading to edgy. i cant completely upgrade some courier packages make problems: http://www.nopaste.linux-beginner.org/?179 can someone help me?
do this first: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -f
oh sorry, this: sudo apt-get install --reinstall courier-authdaemon
do u have any other ideas?
when you reinstall it, try the install -f again
it all doesnt work ive tried both allready
you mean you can't reinstall it?
sudo apt-get install courier-authlib && sudo apt-get install --reinstall courier-authdaemon
if that doesn't work, try reinstalling: sudo apt-get install --reinstall courier-authlib && sudo apt-get install --reinstall courier-authdaemon
can you show me the error please?
its the "error processing package courier-authdaemon package in inconsistent state reinstall before removal" one.
might i ask how did you install that package without dependencies in the first place? :P
i dont know i did: apt-get dist-upgrade after changing dapper to edgy in /etc/apt/sources.list
first you do dist-upgrade, then switch to edgy
you do a upgrade to edgy by doing that. and since i tried to upgrade i get that error the kernel cant be booted too but i now use a rescue system from the network
try downloading the alternate cd and updating from there
